user_question: What are the latest developments in the upcoming movie adaptation of 'The Midnight Library'?
final_answer: The latest developments in the upcoming movie adaptation of 'The Midnight Library' include the announcement of the lead actor, Emma Stone, and the director, Greta Gerwig. Filming is set to begin in early 2024.
